name: Facebook Pixel
headline: Integrate with Facebook advertising tools.
overview:
This application allows you to connect your store to the Facebook ad services.
You will be able to create ads and manage campaigns in real time through a Facebook "Ads Manager" account.
features: Create ads that will appear on Facebook applications and services, including Instagram
Edit ads, target audience and schedules
View the performance of your ads in real time
additionalInformation: For the management of ads, you must have an "Ads Manager" Facebook account.
